Class Writer

extends Object
    Write Certification to a file in several formats.
    Author:
    Guillem LLuch Moll guillem72@gmail.com

    • Method Detail

      • cert2SolrXML

        public void cert2SolrXML(String path,
                         ArrayList<Certification> certs)
                  throws IOException
        Write a file for every certification provided in certs as xml, prepared for an specific Solr implementation.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the directory where the files will be written.
        certs - The list of Certifications to be written.
        Throws:
        IOException - Not possible to write.

      • ecf2xml

        public String ecf2xml(ArrayList<EcfCert> ecfs)
        Transform a list of e-compentece framework mapping in a xml chunk for solr.
        Parameters:
        ecfs - The list with the EcfCerts.
        Returns:
        A string with the compenteces in an xml format.

      • terms2xml

        protected String terms2xml(String field_name,
                           HashMap<String,Double> terms)
        For each term in a map build the correspondend xml chunk.
        Parameters:
        field_name - the name of the field in solr.
        terms - a HashMap string -> value so it has to be previously boosted.
        Returns:
        A xml node represent each string in terms as a field for solr.
